name: SCRAP (itch) (theioti)
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #53

Theme:

    > Assembly Required

Wildcards:

    > Four Color Limit - four-color palette (#242234 #333941 #4a5462 #ffffff), except for splash logos

    > Temperature - your ship's weapons have a heat gauge and can overheat from firing too fast

    > Wait, What?! - there's a plot twist if you make it to the end

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Story and Gameplay:

Assemble a ship to fight off an invasion and protect your home station from the evil LORD ARGBARG (why yes, that is a placeholder I never had time to change, thank you for noticing). Defeat enemy ships and collect scrap from them to upgrade your ship with more blasters, better armor, the ability to launch bombs, and more, but watch the temperature gauge on your weapons or it'll overheat on you. Fight your way through four sectors to face the evil lord himself, but even if you can defeat him, you might find things aren't quite what they seem before reaching one of three endings. Can you figure out how to get the secret one?

Good luck and thanks for playing!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Controls:

Arrow Keys or W/S: Move

Space or Left Click: Fire

B or Right Click: Launch Bomb

P: Pause Game

Some controllers should work as well. I tested with an Xbox One controller and it was all good, though I think others should be fine.

Left Stick or Dpad: Move

Bottom Face Button: Fire

Right Face Button: Launch Bomb

Start/Options: Pause Game
